references.paper_title: DreamBooth: Fine tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the CustomVideoX framework as it introduces the concept of fine-tuning pre-trained models for subject-driven image generation, a key concept extended to video in this work.

references.paper_title: CogVideoX: Text-to-video diffusion models with an expert transformer
references.reason: CogVideoX serves as the base architecture for CustomVideoX, providing the foundational video diffusion transformer model upon which CustomVideoX builds its enhancements.

references.paper_title: Videobooth: Diffusion-based video generation with image prompts
references.reason: VideoBooth is a direct competitor to CustomVideoX, providing a key benchmark and comparison point for evaluating the performance of the proposed zero-shot personalized video generation method.
This paper introduces the Diffusion Transformer (DiT) architecture, which underpins CustomVideoX by enabling efficient processing and interaction between video and text data.

This paper is highly influential as it extends the capabilities of diffusion models to video generation which is crucial for CustomVideoX.  It's a primary source for the diffusion model aspects of the CustomVideoX framework.
